readme:
# Fragment-based virtual screening with docking and pose scoring

Dock a compound library against a target protein with rDock and validate the
poses generated against a reference fragment using SuCOS to compare the feature
overlap. Poses are filtered by a user-specified SuCOS threshold.

A list of fragments should be specified which will be used to define the cavity
for docking, using the 'Frankenstein ligand' technique. For more details, please
see https://www.informaticsmatters.com/blog/2018/11/23/cavities-and-frankenstein-molecules.html

Compounds are split into collections and then recombined to allow the workflow
to be run in a highly parallelized fashion. To specify the level of
parallelization, use the 'Collection size' parameter.
changelog:
# Changelog

## [0.1.5] - 2023-11-20

- Fix author in dockstore

## [0.1.4] - 2023-02-14

### Fixed
- Fix the changeset revisions for 2 tool shed repositories
- Sync version of ``openbabel_compund_convert`` step to newest version

## [0.1.3] - 2022-05-25

### Changed
- Changed creator ORCID to absolute URI

## [0.1.2] - 2021-12-13

### Added
- Added GitHub Actions workflow. No functional changes.

## [0.1.1] - 2021-12-06

### Fixed
- `.workflowhub.yml`: use `repo-name/dockstore-workflow-name` scheme for workflows.
- Moved test data inside repo.

## [0.1]

- Initial version of fragment-based docking and scoring workflow.
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1100 580" role="img" aria-label="Fragment-based virtual screening workflow diagram">
  <title>Fragment-based Virtual Screening with rDock and SuCOS</title>
  <desc>Virtual screening pipeline: receptor preparation, cavity definition, compound docking with rDock, and pose scoring/filtering with SuCOS.</desc>

  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>

  <rect width="1100" height="580" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1100" height="580" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>

  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1100" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Fragment-based Virtual Screening with rDock and SuCOS</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- Receptor -> Cavity Definition -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 120 C 230 120, 270 145, 320 145"/>
  <!-- Fragments -> Frankenstein Ligand -> Cavity Definition -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 230 C 230 230, 270 170, 320 170"/>
  <!-- Compounds -> 3D Conversion -> Split -> rDock Docking -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 340 C 230 340, 250 340, 320 340"/>
  <!-- 3D Conversion -> rDock Docking -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 520 340 C 560 340, 560 290, 600 290"/>
  <!-- Cavity Definition -> rDock Docking -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 520 155 C 570 155, 560 260, 600 260"/>
  <!-- Receptor -> rDock Docking -->
  <path class="connection-secondary" d="M 180 140 C 280 140, 500 240, 600 250"/>
  <!-- rDock Docking -> SuCOS Scoring -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 800 270 C 840 270, 830 270, 860 270"/>
  <!-- Scoring Fragment -> SuCOS Scoring -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 180 440 C 400 440, 760 310, 860 290"/>
  <!-- SuCOS Scoring -> Filter & Sort -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 860 270 C 890 270, 890 270, 920 270"/>
  <!-- Filter & Sort -> Scored Poses output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 920 270 C 940 270, 950 250, 980 250"/>
  <!-- rDock Docking -> Docking Poses output -->
  <path class="connection" d="M 800 290 C 840 290, 920 360, 980 360"/>

  <!-- INPUT NODES -->
  <!-- Receptor (PDB) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0, 80)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Receptor (PDB)</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Protein structure</text>
    <text x="90" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">for docking</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Fragments (SDF) -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0, 190)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">All Fragments (SDF)</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Known binding</text>
    <text x="90" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">fragments</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Candidate Compounds -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0, 300)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Candidate Compounds</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">SMILES library</text>
    <text x="90" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">for screening</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Scoring Fragment -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0, 400)">
    <rect width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="90" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143" text-anchor="middle">Scoring Fragment</text>
    <text x="90" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Reference pose</text>
    <text x="90" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">for SuCOS (SDF)</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING NODES -->
  <!-- Cavity Definition -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(320, 110)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">rDock Cavity Definition</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Define binding site</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">from Frankenstein ligand</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- 3D Conversion & Split -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(320, 300)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">3D Conversion & Split</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Enumerate charges,</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">convert to SDF, split</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- rDock Docking -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(600, 220)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">rDock Docking</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Molecular docking</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">of all candidates</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- SuCOS Scoring & Filtering -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(860, 220)">
    <rect width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="100" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">SuCOS Score & Filter</text>
    <text x="100" y="55" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Pose similarity scoring</text>
    <text x="100" y="70" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">and threshold filtering</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT NODES -->
  <!-- Docking Poses -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(980, 335)">
    <rect width="110" height="50" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="110" height="24" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="110" height="12" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="55" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Docking Poses</text>
    <text x="55" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">SDF</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Scored Poses -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(980, 225)">
    <rect width="110" height="50" rx="4" fill="white"/>
    <rect width="110" height="24" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="12" width="110" height="12" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="55" y="17" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" font-weight="600" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Scored Poses</text>
    <text x="55" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96" text-anchor="middle">Filtered SDF</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- LEGEND -->
  <g transform="translate(20, 520)">
    <rect width="1060" height="45" rx="6" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.85" stroke="#dee2e6"/>
    <rect x="15" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="35" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Input</text>
    <line x1="100" y1="22" x2="150" y2="22" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="4" stroke-linecap="round"/>
    <text x="158" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="260" y1="22" x2="310" y2="22" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="318" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">QC / secondary</text>
    <rect x="440" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="460" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Output</text>
    <rect x="530" y="15" width="14" height="14" rx="3" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="550" y="26" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Processing</text>
  </g>
</svg>
